title: How do I stop the Mozilla Updater Service, from being enabled again after I upgrade firefox
content: I disabled it for a reason. Because it slows down my computer and causes crashes.
creator: desbest

title: Pdf formátum megnyitása
content: A Firefox win 10 alatt fut és alapértelmezett programként van beállítva a PDF fájlokhoz. A fájlkezelőben ha rákkantintok egy Pdf kiterjesztésű fájlra, akkor feljön a Firefox, kapok egy üres ablakot és nem történik semmi. A Firefox Fájl/Fájl megnyitása paranccsal az újonnan indított Firefox simán megnyitja a dokumentumot. Ötletet kérnék, hogy ezt miképp lehetne orvosolni. A korábbi verzióval simán működött ez a szolgáltatás. Üdvözlettel Zebu
creator: zeb.gyu

title: I lost all my password after sync (I did forgot password)
content: Hi. I am a graphic designer and Web master. I use your browser since I think it's the best. I did a format of my pc and I forgot the password of my account. So I did forgot password. Thinking all my password would of sync and follow me. But it didn't. I had over 1000 password from site that I have recently work on and some still working on it. Which were most of them auto generate. Which I wouldn't have a clue of any of them. PLEASE Is there a way for me to regret my passwords? Only the password. Please thanks!
creator: all.star.gfx

title: Firefox ESR Freezes constantly on Apple Mac OS 10.13
content: Firefox forced an update to ESR version on MAC OS 10.13 or older. Now the app freezes constantly.
creator: lskett

title: autoprint despite setting otherwise.
content:
Firefox autoprints Microsoft Word and Excel documents despite setting otherwise.

about:config print.always_print_silent is now set to false. (was somehow set to true). After I set to false and reboot, same behavior occurs. I verified that same behavior does not occur in other browser.
creator: danielh1
